title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
OB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the user selects "Perform build automatically on resource modification" in the Preferences Workbench. This is incorrect.
EB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should be disabled if the user selects "Perform build automatically on resource modification" in the Preferences Workbench.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Go to Preferences -> Workbench.
3. Select "Perform build automatically on resource modification".
4. Open a Java file and right-click to open the context-sensitive popup menu.
5. The "Build" action should still be enabled, which is incorrect.
